alert.note: Alert for Barry; Calhoun; Eaton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:19PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Calhoun, eastern Barry and Eaton Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 117 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms with torrential downpours along a line extending from near Hastings to near Vicksburg. Motorists may encounter temporary flooding of roads and hazardous driving conditions with wind driven rain. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lansing... Charlotte... Albion... Hastings... Marshall... Battle Creek... Eaton Rapids... Grand Ledge... Potterville... Homer... Nashville... Bellevue... Burlington... Brownlee Park... Level Park-Oak Park... Edgemont Park... Marengo... Assyria... Kalamo... Olivet... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
